nodes.text: That's where Moira keeps most of her medicines.
Holy Kraken, that's a big cabinet. I wonder what's in it.
Hmm... behind the glass doors, there are various types of potion bottles. Seems like they would be very useful things to have in case of emergency.
And I tend to have a lot of emergencies...
Through the glass doors of this cabinet, I can see mostly healing potions and Antidote potions.
That cabinet's for the use of Infirmary Personnel only.
I understand. And it's not as if I'd come back later and just open it while you're not around.
What was that?
Oh, man. I have to work on my "innocent" act.
It's locked. But...
... it'd be silly to let that stop me just this once.
Ooh! Stuff I want! I don't want to clean them out... I'll just take one each of this and this. And I'll rearrange the rest so Moira might not notice anything's missing.
Oooh! Stuff I want! I don't want to clean them out... I'll just take one each of this and this and this. And I'll rearrange the rest so nobody notices.
I'd feel really guilty if I stole a potion and someone else suffered because of it. I'll just leave these things here.
I'll just borrow another Healing Potion from here. I'm sure Lady Moira won't notice.
Hmmm... the cabinet is starting to get low on Healing Potions. Still, surely no one will notice one more missing bottle from here.
Eh, down to the last bottle left. Guess I should take it before it's gone.
Shawn O'Conner - this infirmary is not your personal medical cabinet!
But... um...
No excuses! I don't want to catch you stealing from this infirmary again. Those potions are to save lives in the case of emergency.
Twenty demerits for you - and don't you dare try to steal these potions again. Go!
She's right here. Do I seriously look that stupid? Or was this some sort of a test?
Got it! This lock's no match for my superior skills.
Drat. Looks like I need to practice my skills more before I can pick this one.
If I only had a lockpick.
There's nothing magical about the cabinet. Or its lock.
It's an ordinary cabinet. If it'd been magical, I'd probably still be trying to pick the lock.
However, there is some magic on the bottles inside the cabinet.
